column4: Is there a program that I can get that'll look at my system and make a kernel that'll run ubuntu with it?
I need to make my on kernel, as any 2.6.15+ refuse to boot , and I can't install a graphics driver on 2.6.12-9
Is there anyone with kernel advice? Is it possible to make a kernel for Ubuntu? Or use one from another distro?
as far as I know, sure, you can make a Kernel for Ubuntu
